summary: DOD's TRICARE health plan covers servicemembers, retirees, and their families. If beneficiaries have additional insurance, that insurance generally pays first, and TRICARE pays second. We found that: Military health care facilities have trouble processing non-TRICARE insurance, and may be missing opportunities to bill insurers Information that DOD has tried to collect about beneficiaries' additional insurance may be incomplete or inaccurate DOD is moving toward collecting...
title: Defense Health Care: DOD Expects New IT System Capabilities to Improve Other Health Insurance Processing
